title: myVirtualHealthVisit
description:
Feeling sick usually happens at the most inconvenient times. However, that doesn’t mean getting the care you need has to be inconvenient too.

You can now have convenient and quality care at your fingertips and even in the comfort of your own bed with the myVirtualHealthVisit app. The myVirtualHealthVisit app provides an easy way to connect with a live provider when it’s convenient for you. You can access a provider in your car, office, or home. A virtual health video visit eliminates time traveling to the urgent care or waiting for an appointment at a doctor’s office.

Receive quality and convenient care on your terms at a time, location, and cost that fits your lifestyle. Urgent care visits on myVirtualHealthVisit cost only $49 or less.

You might be thinking, “When can I use this app—for a sore throat, cough, or headache?” The answer is Yes! Yes! Yes! myVirtualHealthVisit can be used for common conditions such as:
• Upper Respiratory Infections/Flu
• Bronchitis
• Sinus Infection
• Earache
• Conjunctivitis (Pinkeye)
• Urinary Tract Infection
• Skin Disorders
• Back Pain

In addition to on-demand urgent care services, myVirtualHealthVisit now offers scheduled visits across a variety of specialties with many of Suburban Health Organization’s own Hospital Providers. myVirtualHealthVisit is not for emergency or life-threatening conditions, such as chest pain or shortness of breath. If you have a medical emergency, please call 911 immediately.

Now that you have decided to download the app and are waiting for your virtual health visit to begin, you might be wondering what to expect. You can expect to communicate with a provider through a live video and audio chat. The video and audio chat features allow the myVirtualHealthVisit provider to diagnose, prescribe medication, and suggest an in-person follow-up visit, if you need it.  

Your next question might be, “I have a child who is sick. Can I use this app for my child?” The answer is yes! Additionally, as a patient you can invite others to join your video visit (i.e. a spouse, son/daughter of an elderly patient, parent of a college student, etc.)

Along with your care, your privacy is very important to us. Any information that you provide when enrolling, including your personal health and credit card details, is secure. Your visit is private, and any information that you share with the provider is protected in accordance with HIPAA guidelines for patient safety and confidentiality.

myVirtualHealthVisit is also integrated with Apple Health (iOS only), so you can choose to share your health information with the doctor during your virtual visit, including heart rate, blood pressure, body temperature, blood glucose levels, weight, nutritional information, and respiratory rate.

myVirtualHealthVisit brings a provider to you, regardless of where you live in Indiana. myVirtualHealthVisit is a collaboration among Indiana hospitals working together to promote quality, efficiency, and patient access in the communities they serve. Collaborating hospitals include:
• Goshen Health
• Hancock Health
• Hendricks Regional Health
• Henry Community Health
• Johnson Memorial Health
• Major Health Partners
• Margaret Mary Health
• Marion General Hospital
• Riverview Health
• Witham Health Services

For more information, visit our website:
https://www.suburbanhealth.com/shared-services/online-doctor-visits/

summary: Feel better today, connect with myVirtualHealthVisit to see a provider now!
summaryHTML: Feel better today, connect with myVirtualHealthVisit to see a provider now!
recentChanges:
We continue to improve the patient experience with these new features:
• Performance enhancements to increase reliability and speed
recentChangesHTML:
We continue to improve the patient experience with these new features:
• Performance enhancements to increase reliability and speed
comments: Worked great on my android Moto Phone.

It was a awesome visit, covered all issues and were dealt with. My Doctor is a compassionate Doctor but strong about what she wants or doesnt want , is very explanatory thou. Very decisve Doctor. The video chat was smooth vision clear, sound clear. Is simple as can be to load and was self explanatory... I really like it , give it 5 stars and would definitely , absolutely reconmend this app. For quick smooth efficient visit with your own doctor...

I had just a tiny square that showed and when I went to switch the camera to the back camera it wouldn't let me. So I had to try and look at the tiny piture on the phine w it turned facing my foot. Then had to try and get a good view of my foot with it twisted around. Would be nice if it switched so it wasn't so difficult for tye Dr to see.

For 2 days I've been waiting nearly nonstop for a physician and have never been connected. The only times which I haven't been waiting are when I'm sleeping or the doctors finally go offline. I don't know if this is due to the app or the doctors, but my experience so far has been horrendous!

I'm a senior citizen w compromised immunity. I just had my 1st, virtual Dr visit ever! It was a very clear picture, & I had a perfect connection in the country, & w/out Wifi in r home. W/no lapses in time, no voices cutting out, & no glitches. It was above, what I had expected. Thank u all, for a clear & excellent virtual Dr visit, to help keep this Senior Citizen, @ home & safe. :)

I love being able to stay home yet talk to the doctor. This is an wonderful idea especially during these times of covid-19. I have issues that doesn't have any connections to the virus so I really prefer not to subject myself to it if it's not necessary. It's like the modern day house visit ❣️

Very easy to use and never any issues with connection. The appointments are put on the calendar prior so when you log on, you just have to click "get started" and it connects you to the doctor or medical provider.
I love this method! But i preferr a personal Dr. Visit. I would definitely use it again. It save time and expense. Picture & voice is clear.
The virtual visit was clear, there was no blurring, no audio difficulties we understood each other very well.
I love this it's a wonderful experience when you can't be face to face with our dr or their staff thank you for a wonderful experience with your app
Everything was great with the visit. I would just love to go in and see my health care providers in person.
This was used for a visit with my primary car doctor. Very user friendly! Easy to use. Great quality
Very easy to navigate. Sound and picture were perfect
This app is great...didnt have any issues with my appt at all...
Connection in quality very good would recommend this app in this time of need
Worked very well. Just wish bottom bar would disappear.
It went great, just like going into the office , only better because I was able to do it anywhere my phone could go
Loved doing my appt on this app! Real easy!
The wait is kinda long unless you select the doctor yourself. Other than that, it was easy enough.
Easy to use for beginners, or advanced users
Buffered a bit and had trouble hearing. Not sure if that was user error though....
Was great virtual photo -understood other end fine.Thank-you🙂
Great experience, quick and easy
Great experience with my at home video visit with my Doctor.
Easy, saves trip time for visits
Once again, Dr. Wedlock was extremely helpful, concerned and caring.
Easy to use and speedy!
I do not like to see myself. It is not at all like a face to face real office visit but for now I am glad to see him. Thanks for setting this up.
Was over all a great experience, but a little strange
Was very easy and great!
Good, clear picture and voice
This works far better than Iimagined it would. A great experience
When stuck at home, this is GREAT!!
This app allowed me to see my health provider. For that iI am very Thankful God bless each and everyone of you and yoir site.
Asks too many personal questions getting started. This app does not need to know
Different. But nice to connect with my doctor
Fast easy-to-use
Clear and easy
The app worked great!
Love this app.
